name: Chaos: Race Conditions
description: Introduces artificial delays to expose race condition vulnerabilities.
challenges: Artificial delay between check and trigger makes race conditions likely
interviewer_notes: Use the /alerts/check-concurrent endpoint to simulate 5 parallel checks. Watch for double triggers. Ask candidate how they would prevent this.
interviewer_prompt: I'm going to hit an endpoint that simulates 5 concurrent check requests. Watch what happens to the alerts. Can you explain the bug and how to fix it?
